attributes.action: Reconsider the 70 mm diameter 'no-smoking' sign to be compulsarily displayed in company owned vehicles - especially company cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While in full support of England becoming non-smoking in public places, it is preposterous that every company car should have to display such a massive no-smoking sign.  It points out to those with malign interests that it is a company car as well as detracting from the aesthetics of the vehicle.
